dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset designed for studying the dynamics of several update rules and their convergence to the optimum under specific constraints, including a two-dimensional parameter space and a unique tractable optimum parameter setting.
dcterms:title: Synthetic 2D Contextual Bandit

dcterms:creator: D. Precup
dcterms:description: A tabular environment where an agent receives a reward of 10 for reaching a predefined goal cell and 0 otherwise, used to evaluate the performance of various scaling functions in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: FourRoom Environment

dcterms:creator: D. Precup
dcterms:description: A continuous control benchmark used for evaluating reinforcement learning algorithms, particularly in the context of Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO).
dcterms:title: MuJoCo continuous control benchmark
